info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 3 at 8:40PM CDT until June 4 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas...
Walnut River near El Dorado affecting Butler County.
West Branch Walnut River at El Dorado affecting Butler County.
Walnut River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...
Walnut River at Winfield affecting Butler and Cowley Counties.
Walnut River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County.
* WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...West Branch Walnut River at El Dorado.
* WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Roads flood in northeast El Dorado between 8th Avenue and 12th Avenue. Then 10 miles north of El Dorado, flood waters cover county roads from northwest 75th to 110th.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.5 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 845 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON
